other_tests.findings: 30% plasma cells; flow-cytometric studies revealed an IgG lambda M component.
No evidence of malignant cells or amyloid.
Trace mitral regurgitation, trace tricuspid insufficiency; left ventricular ejection fraction of 64%; ascending aorta 41 mm in diameter; no evidence of amyloid or pericardial effusion.
Fibrosing dermopathy with interstitial mucin deposition and collagen expansion of the dermis extending to the subcutaneous tissue; sparse lymphoplasmacytic infiltrate present.
Severe acute gastritis with marked erythema and friability.
Reticulation in subpleural region, bronchiolectasis; small pleural effusion; generalized osteopenia with multiple lytic lesions.
Expansion of the lamina propria and prominent fibromuscular hyperplasia consistent with gastric antral vascular ectasia.
